summary: This document appears to be a daily assignment log or roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, covering dates in July and August 2019. It lists shift assignments, days off, sick leave, and overtime for a staff member assigned to the Special Housing Unit (SHU #3). The document's date stamp suggests it was generated on August 12, 2019, which is shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest and during his incarceration at MCC.

events.title: Staff Travel and Overtime
events.description: A staff member had travel time and overtime recorded, with an entry for 'RET TRAVEL: #2 OT 08:00-08:30' and 'LANS 2 OTM/W 2'.

events.description: A staff member worked overtime from 22:00 to 00:00, logged as 'LANS 2 OT 22:00-00:00'.

events.description: A staff member took sick leave on this date.

locations.name: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC)
locations.context: The federal detention facility where this staff assignment log is from. Jeffrey Epstein was held here in 2019.

locations.name: Special Housing Unit #3 (SHU #3)
locations.context: A specific unit within the MCC where the staff member was frequently assigned for the P/M (presumably Post/Midnight or a specific shift) shift.

keyFacts: This is a staff assignment record for the MCC in New York from the third quarter of 2019, specifically covering late July and early August.
The primary assignment for the staff member was to 'SHU #3' on the 'P/M 10' shift, with regular days off and instances of overtime and sick leave.
The document is dated August 12, 2019, which places it during the period Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated at the MCC prior to his death.
The log indicates standard prison staff scheduling and does not contain any direct references to inmates, specific events, or named individuals beyond the institutional context.
